titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California

did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Hoover Institution on War, Revolution, and Peace

did.abstract: Correspondence, notes, reports, press releases, newsletters, bulletins, and printed matter, relating to higher education and student radicalism in West Germany, especially at the Freie Universität Berlin, and to the organization and activities of the Notgemeinschaft für eine freie Universität and the Bund Freiheit der Wissenschaft.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Georg Nicolaus Knauer Papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Increments may have been received since this finding aid was prepared. Please check Stanford University's online catalog Socrates at http://library.stanford.edu/webcat to find the full extent of the collection.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: German classical philologist; professor, Freie Universität Berlin, 1954-1974.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, notes, reports, press releases, newsletters, bulletins, and printed matter, relating to higher education and student radicalism in West Germany, especially at the Freie Universität Berlin, and to the organization and activities of the Notgemeinschaft für eine freie Universität and the Bund Freiheit der Wissenschaft.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the repository's online public access catalog.

controlaccess.head: Subjects
controlaccess.corpname: Notgemeinschaft für eine freie Universität (Berlin, Germany)
controlaccess.subject: Education.
Education--Germany (West)
Radicalism--Germany (West)
Universities and colleges--Germany (West)
Conservatism.

scopecontent.p: Includes press releases of the Notgemeinschaft, and slides of the Berlin Office
Includes press releases of the Notgemeinschaft
Includes material from after 1975 January 1 [Georg N. Knauer's move to Philadelphia]

did.unittitle: Notgemeinschaft publications (incomplete), 1974 November 1 - 1981 December 1, but including #151-249

scopecontent.p: Also material relating to Eberhard Lämmert, 1976; Hanns-Martin Schleyer, 1977; Georg Picht, Helmut Becker; and various other material, such as clippings, 1979

did.unittitle: Material relating to Berlin, 1974; Bremen; Bund Freiheit der Wissenschaft
Various publications, off prints, clippings, etc., relating to Alexander Schwan, Wilhelm Hennis, René Ahlberg, Ernst Nolte, Ernst Fraenkel, Richard Loewenthal
Notgemeinschaft publications, ca. 1972-1976 and 1986-1989 (incomplete, in disorder).

Notgemeinschaft publications (duplicates); material relating to the Bund Freiheit der Wissenschaft; the ICUE (International Council on the University Emergency); the "Hochschule in der Demokratie," 1964?; the "Kritische Universität (Berlin); Georg N. Knauer (Minerva); "Gutachten Borinski-Knauer"
